## jx step verify pod

status of kubernetes pods

### Synopsis

This step checks the status of all kubernetes pods

```
jx step verify pod [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  jx step verify pod
```

### Options

```
      --debug   Output logs of any failed pod
  -h, --help    help for pod
```
